title: TIHLDE webpage
text: Tech lead for TIHLDE's webpage and member system. Me and my team are creating a platform for our members to use at a daily basis, both at uni, at home and at a party. I personally have build the entire event's system to help with organizing and promoting future events and business presentations.

title: NTNUI Sprint
text: I am working as a frontend developer to help create a member system for NTNUI's 12,000 members. I am currently developing a portal for admin and coaches to be able to view and administrate there members.

title: Portfolio
text: I designed and developed this portfolio from the bottom. For the design process I took a lot of inspiration from my resume, and several other designs found online. The entire design is designed using Abode Illustrator and XD. I decided to use React as the frontend framework, instead of just JQuery, HTML and CSS, because of future expandability.
